TYPEFORM_API_BASE_URL.description: An entry point for the Typeform services (OAuth + API)

APPLICATION_URL.description: Application URL which will be used to construct a callback URL for OAuth mechanism

CLIENT_ID.description: The Client ID you've got from Typeform

CLIENT_SECRET.description: The Client Secret you've got from Typeform

COMMUNITY_NAME.description: The name of your community. e.g. 'My Cool Community'

SLACK_TOKEN.description: The token provided by Slack to your team

INVITE_TOKEN.description: The Invite token for your Slack community
